resources.string: Enable to turn on Screen Notifications
Enable to allow shorter screen timeouts
More apps will appear as notifications are received
No app has created a notification yet. Check back later to enable or disable an app. By default any notification will turn the screen on unless the app is disabled here.
Enable and disable apps to turn the screen on for notifications. Apps that create a notification for the first time will automatically turn the screen on.
Device Admin option must be enabled first
Wait %d seconds before turning the screen on.\n\nUse this option if turning the screen on prevents notification sounds from playing.
Do not turn the screen on between the hours below
Open the tray when the screen is turned for a notification. This is experimental and will only work on a small number of devices.
Screen Notifications needs device admin access to turn off your screen after a notification
